items.titolo: OpenAI commits to 'paying our own way' so that Stargate AI data centers don't increase energy bills — will fund grid upgrades and even flexible loads to reduce stress on energy supply
items.descrizione: OpenAI says it will ensure Stargate does not increase electricity prices in communities where it is building its data centers.

items.titolo: Google Calendar, Gemini può creare eventi da più calendari
items.descrizione: Gemini su Google Calendar ora supporta i calendari secondari come faceva Google Assistant, ma solo all’interno dello stesso account. The post Google Calendar, Gemini può creare eventi da più calendari appeared first on P

items.titolo: The Race to Build the DeepSeek of Europe Is On
items.descrizione: As Europe’s long-standing alliance with the US falters, its push to become a self-sufficient AI superpower has become more urgent.
